## BlockObject type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type BlockObject = {
    number: Quantity;
    hash: TxHash;
    parentHash: TxHash;
    nonce: Data;
    sha3Uncles: TxHash;
    logsBloom: Data;
    transactionsRoot: TxHash;
    stateRoot: TxHash;
    receiptsRoot: TxHash;
    miner: Address;
    difficulty: BigNumber;
    totalDifficulty: BigNumber;
    extraData: Data;
    size: Quantity;
    gasLimit: Quantity;
    gasUsed: Quantity;
    timestamp: Quantity;
    transactions: Array<TxHash> | Array<TransactionObject>;
    uncles: Array<TxHash>;
};
```
